main.name: Sasha Demyanik
main.occupation: Software Engineer, mobile app developer, web developer
main.description: I develop C++ and Qt applications by day and create mobile apps/web solutions by night!
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer II at Graphic Products, Inc who is skilled at designing, developing and deploying software using C++ and Qt.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Software Engineer II
work.description: Released label editing program to customers across multiple devices using C++ and Qt. Decreased developer testing time by 40% through creation of an automated testing framework for a label editing application. Delivered a Windows printer driver alongside new company product. Identified and implemented new features to existing software suite to improve usability and functionality based on customer feedback.

work.title: IT Intern
work.description: Migrated company SharePoint pages for multiple departments from SharePoint 2007 to SharePoint 2010. Audited internal permissions system in Lotus to improve efficiency of user permission approval.
